hashtag#Marketing hashtag#Consultant Location: India - Tier 1 and Tier2 citiesJob Type: (Commission-only) Earn upto 15 lacs per year.Job Summary:We are seeking dynamic and motivated Marketing Consultant to join our team. This is a field based position. The role involves generating leads and promoting training programs aimed at educational institutions and health sectors such as hashtag#12thstandard, hashtag#nursing colleges, hashtag#physiotherapist colleges, hashtag#Occupationaltherapy colleges, hashtag#AYUSH institutes, and hashtag#alliedhealth institutions. DM us for more info.How to Apply:Interested candidates should submit their resume along with a cover letter highlighting their relevant experience and why they are suitable for this position. This is a field based position. The role involves generating leads and promoting training programs aimed at educational institutions and health sectors such as hashtag#12thstandard, hashtag#nursing colleges, hashtag#physiotherapist colleges, hashtag#Occupationaltherapy colleges, hashtag#AYUSH institutes, and hashtag#alliedhealth institutions. This is a field based position. The role involves generating leads and promoting training programs aimed at educational institutions and health sectors such as hashtag#12thstandard, hashtag#nursing colleges, hashtag#physiotherapist colleges, hashtag#Occupationaltherapy colleges, hashtag#AYUSH institutes, and hashtag#alliedhealth institutions.
